variants.Description in input context: This variant results in a premature termination of the protein, leading to loss of function.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293 cell line transfected with TRAF2 wild-type and mutant plasmids.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression was undetectable for the variant NM_004378.5:c.1692C>T, indicating a complete loss of function.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for both wild-type and mutant samples.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type TRAF2 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis between wild-type and mutant samples.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% on day 7.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% on day 7, or undetectable protein expression.
